body: Dangling pointer, bad use of smart pointer, or something related to virtual function use in constructors or destructors. I'll check it out. Is this from the current master or some PR? I'll assume master unless I hear otherwise.

Some PR... Forget which... Seen a few times however.

On Wed, Jul 1, 2015, 6:06 PM Vijay Pai notifications@github.com wrote:

> Dangling pointer, bad use of smart pointer, or something related to
> virtual function use in constructors or destructors. I'll check it out. Is
> this from the current master or some PR? I'll assume master unless I hear
> otherwise.
> 
> â€”
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub
> https://github.com/grpc/grpc/issues/2287#issuecomment-117866381.
I have been running this test for 16 hours on master (at commit d426864 ) in a while loop and have not yet been able to reproduce the bug or any other assertion failure or termination.
Couldn't reproduce in 24 hours of tests. I would like to close unless this pops up again.

Seen under TSAN just now:

```
=================
```
